title: League
body: Why is it saying that LoL is unavailable in North America right now? I know that they are doing maintenance but it said it would be over at 7:00 and its 8:30 were I live at. Could someone Please tell me what is going on?

replies.body: There was indeed maintenance last night which requires some downtime.  It ended up being extended and was a little bit longer.  Updates on maintenance and issues will be provided on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Everything should be okay now, so let me know if you're still having issues.
Yeah I still am. Now when I try to play a game, it will go through character select, but when the game finally tries to load it will crash and ask me to send an error report. Can you please help?
